abilities.description: 0718 Increases the Critical Hit Chances by X when defending the Station.
0718 increases the Defense of all Officers on the ship by X.
When fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armada Targets), for the first three rounds of combat, Ahvix increases the chances of a Critical Hit by X
When fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armadas), Ahvix has a X chance to decrease the Shield Deflection, Armor and Dodge of the opponent by 40% .
Airiam increases the mining speed of Isogen by X.
When defending on a Capture Node, at the start of each round, Airiam has a X chance of Burning the opponent for this round.

Increases Apex Shred against players by X (X at rank X) when assigned to the GS-31. -- Apex Barrier remaining after Apex Shred is equal to: -- Apex Barrier / (100% + Apex Shred). -- 100% Apex Shred reduces Apex Barrier by 50%.
Increases Apex Barrier against Explorer hostiles by X (X at rank X). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Alonzo Freeman increases the Cargo size of the ship by X.
Alonzo Freeman increases the base amount of positive Federation, Romulan and Klingon reputation gained from defeating hostiles by X.

On round start, if on an Interceptor and enemy player has Hull Breach, Andy Billups increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 1 round. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
On round start, if on a Battleship and enemy player has Burning, Andy Billups increases your Isolytic Defense by X for 1 round.

Increases select rewards from hostile chests (G3-G6 Parts & Refined Materials, FKR Messages & Credits, Hirogen Relics, Mycellium, Exotic Biotoxins, Xindi Scraps & Bounties, Trellium, Fatu-Kray Scraps) by X of base.
Increases Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 2 rounds when hit by a hostile (Once per weapon)(Cumulative). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Every time the opponent is hit by an energy weapon attack, Arix has a X chance of Burning it. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this maneuver once per attack.)
As long as the ship's Hull Health is under 70% of its value at the start of combat, Arix increases its Armor by X
When the shield is depleted, Arkady has a X chance of inspiring Morale to the ship for 3 rounds.
Arkady increases the Shield Health of the ship by X.
Increase mining speed when mining Concentrated Latinum by X.
Increase mining speed by X.

When hitting the enemy with a Kinetic weapon attack, Azetbur has a X chance of causing a Hull Breach for 2 rounds on the opponent's ship. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
Every time the ship hits the opponent with a weapon attack, Azetbur increases the Armor Piercing of the ship by X. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)

When you take damage from a non-Player hostile or Armada, B'Elanna increases your Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy by X of Attack for 1 round. (cumulative). -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
X chance each round to apply Hull Breach to non-Player hostiles or Armada for 1 round.
When on a ship that can use cloaking, B'Etor increases the duration the ship can stay cloaked by X.
When on the Amalgam, B'Etor boosts the Amalgam's bonus loot ship ability by X.
Ba'el increases the ship's Weapon Damage by X.
Ba'el increases the ship's Armor by X of total Crew Attack.
Badgey decreases the Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge of enemy ships by X.
Badgey increases Armor Penetration, Shield Penetration, and Accuracy by X.
Barot increases the rate of Crystal Mining by X.
When the ship becomes attacked while mining, at the beginning of combat, Barot decreases the opponent's Hull Health by X.
Beckett Mariner increases the Attack of all Officers on the ship by X.
Beckett Mariner increases the ship's Weapon Damage by X.
Benjamin Sisko increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of total Health when fighting Armadas.
Benjamin Sisko increases critical hit chance against Armadas by X every round (Cumulative).
When fighting Hostiles and Armadas, Beverly Crusher restores Shield Health each round equal to X of the Health of all Officers on the ship.
When fighting Hostiles and Armadas, Beverly Crusher increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of the Defense of all Officers on the ship.
SNW Black Ops Chapel increases base positive Reputation gained from Federation, Klingon and Romulan Hostiles by X (X at rank X).
SNW Black Ops Chapel increases the ship's base Hull Health by X (X at rank X).
SNW Black Ops M'Benga increases Isolytic Defense by X (X at rank X) versus Suliban Hostiles.
SNW Black Ops M'Benga restores the Shield Health of your ship every round by X (X at rank X) when fighting hostiles.
McCoy gives a bonus of X to all the Officer Abilities of the Officers on the bridge during combat. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.

Every time the ship gets hit by a weapon attack, McCoy increases the Defense of all the officers on the Bridge by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
While fighting against a Borg Solo Armada, upon receiving Hull Damage from an enemy shot, increase Critical Hit Chance by X (Cumulative).
While fighting a player ship with Assimilate, Borg Queen increases the ship's Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy by X each round (Cumulative).
Brad Boimler increases Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy by X.
Brad Boimler increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X.
When hit by an Armada or Hostile, increases Critical Damage by X (X at rank X) for 4 rounds -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack).
Increases base Loot gained from non-Armada Hostiles by X (X at rank X).
Cadet Kirk increases the Attack, Defense and Health of all Officers on the Bridge by X.
Kirk increases the Weapon damage of the ship by X.
Cadet McCoy increases the Health of all Officers on the ship by X.
During combat, Cadet McCoy increases the effectiveness of the Captain Maneuver by X.
Cadet Scotty increases the Ship Hull Health by X.
Cadet Scotty increases the Warp Distance of the ship by X.
Cadet Sulu increases the damage of the first shots of the ship by X for the first round.
Cadet Sulu increases the Attack of all the Officers on the ship by X.
Cadet Uhura decreases the Weapon Damage of the opponent's ship by X.
Cadet Uhura increases the Shield Health of the ship by X.

When attacking on a capture node, at the start of each turn, as long as the opponent's ship has a Hull Breach, Captain Tilly increases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy of the ship by X of the total Defense of all Officers on the ship (cumulative).
At the start of each round, if the opponent has a Hull Breach, Captain Tilly increases the Armor, Shield deflection and Dodge by X of the total Health of all Officers on the ship (cumulative).
When defending in battle against a player, Carol decreases the Weapon Damage from opponents by X.
Carol increases the Weapon Damage by X.
On combat start against players, Carol Freeman increases your shots by X.

On round start, if the enemy player has any state, Carol Freeman increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 1 round. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses. -- States: Morale, Burning, Hull Breach, Assimilated
Cath increases the Repair Cost Efficiency of the ship by X. -- This ability is applied after all other bonuses from research and/or your station and stacked on top.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Cath decreases the Damage done by its Kinetic Weapons by X. Works against Hostiles of level 51 and under.
Increases the number of shots of your ship's weapons by X versus Armadas. -- Chakotay receives full synergy bonuses from all Voyager officers regardless of class.
Increases the Critical Hit Chance of your ship by X for 2 rounds each time you score a hit versus Armadas.
As long as the opponent's ship Hull Health is under 60%, Chang increases the Damage of the weapons by X.
If the ship deals a Critical Hit to the opponent's ship while it has a Hull Breach, Chang has a X chance of delaying its next weapon attack by 1 round.
Changeling Kira decreases critical hit chance of Cardassian Armadas by X every round (Cumulative).
Changeling Kira decreases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge of Armadas by X of Attack every time you hit it with a weapon.
When the ship's Hull Health goes under 80% of its value at the start of combat, Charvanek has a X chance of Burning the opponent for 3 rounds.
At the start of combat, Charvanek increases the Armor Piercing of the ship by X of the Health of the crew on the ship.
Chen increases the Dodge, Shield Deflection and Armor of the ship by X against Hostiles. Works against Hostiles of level 51 and under.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Chen decreases the damage done by its Energy Weapons by X. Works against Hostiles of level 51 and under.
When defending on a Capture Node, Hugh Culber increases Armor by X of the total Health of the Officers on the ship.
Hugh increases the Cost Efficiency of Jumping and Summoning with the Discovery by X.
After winning a combat, D'jaoki increases the Health of all officers on the ship by X for 1 minute.
At the beginning of each round, if the opponent is  Burning, D'jaoki increases the Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge of the ship by X of the Health of all Officers on the ship.
D'Vana Tendi increases the Health of all Officers on the ship by X.
D'Vana Tendi increases the ship's Hull Health by X.
Increases base Loot gained from Armadas and Hostiles by X
X (X at rank X) chance to increase base Weapon Shots by 100% every round against Armadas and Invading Entities for 2 rounds (Cumulative)
While on an Interceptor fighting a player ship with Hull Breach, if Damar scores a Critical Hit, increase Critical Hit Chance by X once per Weapon for the remainder of battle.
While on an Interceptor fighting a player ship with Hull Breach, if Damar scores a Critical Hit, decrease opponent Critical Hit Damage by X once per Weapon for 3 rounds.
Alexander Dane increases the amount of loot gained from defeating Mirror Universe Hostiles by X (X at rank X) when assigned to the NSEA Protector
Alexander Dane Increases your ship's base Impulse Speed by X (X at rank X).
When the ship is attacked by a player, Darwin increases the Weapon Damage by X.
Darwin increases the Ship Experience gained on Interceptors by X.
When fighting Hostiles and Armadas, Data increases the Critical Hit Chance by X.
When fighting non-player targets (including Mission Hostiles), Data increases Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing, and Accuracy by X.
Deanna Troi reduces the Crit Chance of Armada Targets by X.
Deanna Troi increases Weapon Damage against Romulan Hostiles and Romulan Armadas by X.
When fighting a ship with a bigger Strength, Decius increases Accuracy, Armor Piercing and Shield Piercing of the ship by X.
Every time the ship gets hit by a weapon attack, Decius increases its Weapon Damage by X. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)

Gwen DeMarco increases Isolytic Cascade damage against Armadas and Invading Entities by X (X at rank X) -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.

Gwen DeMarco Increases Isolytic Cascade Damage in PvP when the enemy player has any state by  X (X at rank X) -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
While fighting against a Borg Solo Armada, increase all Officer stats by X for the duration of combat.

At the start of each round, if opponents Hull health is below 95%, Dezoc has X chance to apply Assimilate to it for 4 rounds. -- While a ship is affected by the Assimilate state, Officer Abilities have their effectiveness reduced by 25%.
While defending a mining node, Dixon Hill reduces the opponent's Shield Mitigation every round by X. (This ability can stack)
Dixon Hill increases base Mining Speed by X.
On round start, Dr. T'Ana has X chance to apply a random State to the enemy player's ship for 3 rounds. -- Random States: Morale, Burning, Hull Breach
On round start against players, Dr. T'Ana increases your Isolytic Defense by X for 1 round.
Domitia increases the Mining Rate of the ship by X when mining Dilithium.
As long as the Cargo of the ship is full, Domitia increases its Warp speed by X.
Raphaël DuPont increases the rate of G3 Crystal, Gas and Ore Mining by X.
Raphaël DuPont increases the Protected Cargo by X.
When fighting a Borg ship, Eight of Eleven increases the Chance of dealing a critical hit by X.
Eight of Eleven increases the Attack of every Officer on the ship by X.
Eleven of Eleven increases Crystal mining speed by X.
Eleven of Eleven increases Warp Speed by X.
Decreases the opponent crew's Defense by a stacking X of base each round when attacking a player during a Takeover.

When attacking a player on a capture node, at the start of each round, Emperor Georgiou increases the number of shots of each weapon by X. (cumulative) -- Weapon shots are rounded to the nearest whole number
Increases your ship’s Max Cargo by X of base.
Increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by X versus non-Armada Hostiles -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
Increases the rewards gained from Hostiles, Armadas and Outposts by X of base.

Increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by X for 3 rounds each time you hit a non-Armada Hostile (once per weapon). -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
Increases your ship’s base Impulse Speed by X.
Increases Critical Hit Chance by X for 4 rounds each time you score a hit (Once per weapon).
Reduces the opponent’s Shield Health by X of total Officer Attack at the beginning of each round versus non-Armada Hostiles.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by X versus Armadas and Hostiles.

When the ship loses Shield Health from a weapon attack, Eurydice increases the damage of the weapons by X (cumulative). Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this maneuver once per attack.)
When the shields are depleted, Eurydice has a X chance to heal the Shield Health by 5%. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Ezri Dax increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by X when attacked by a Player while on a Survey Ship.
Ezri Dax increases Isolytic Cascade Damage by X (X at rank X) for 2 rounds on round start against players, if the opponent has any state.
Increase base mining speed by X.
Reduce protected cargo by X.
Five of Eleven Increases the Shield deflection, Armor and Dodge by X of the total Health of all Officers on the ship.
Five of Eleven increases the amount of resources your ship receives from hostiles by X.
Four of Eleven increases Ore mining speed by X.
Four of Eleven increases Cargo size by X.
On round start, if placed on a ship with Morale against players, French Marshal Q increases your weapon shots by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds.
On round start, if the enemy player has any state, French Marshal Q repairs X (X at rank X) of hull damage taken in the previous round of combat.
Gaila increases the Parsteel rewards for defeating a Hostile by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Gaila decreases the damage from its Critical Hits by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
While on an Interceptor fighting a player ship with Hull Breach, Garak reduces opponent Kinetic Weapon Damage by X each round.
While on an Interceptor fighting a player ship with Hull Breach, Garak increases Critical Hit Chance by X each round.
Geordi La Forge increases the rewards your ship receives from defeated Armada Targets by X.
Geordi La Forge increases Weapon Damage against Klingon Hostiles and Klingon Armadas by X.

At the start of each round, if the opponent is Burning , Captain Georgiou decreases the Attack of all Officers on the opponent's ship by X for that round. -- Decreasing Attack may result in a decrease in Damage
At the beginning of each round, Georgiou has a X chance of Burning the opponent's ship for 2 rounds.
Ghalenar increases the Faction Reputation gained from Federation, Klingon and Romulan hostiles by X.
Ghalenar increases Actian Venom and Inert Nanoprobe loot dropped from hostiles by X of their base value.
Ghrush increases the Protected Cargo of the ship by X.
Ghrush increases the Warp Range of the ship by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Gonzales increases the chances of dealing a Critical Hit by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Gonzales increases the damage of Critical Hits by X.
When fighting Hostiles, Goon increases the chances of dealing a Critical Hit by  X for the first round of combat.
Goon increases the Ship XP gained by the ship from fighting by X.
Gorkon increases the chances of dealing a Critical Hit by  X for the first 2 Rounds.
When the ship hits the opponent with a Critical Hit, Gorkon has a X chance of causing a Hull Breach for three rounds on the opponent's ship.
When fighting against a Borg Solo Armada, at the start of each round reduce target's Critical Damage by X for 1 round.
While fighting a player ship with Assimilate, Gossa increases the ship's Armor, Shield Deflection and Dodge by X each round (Cumulative).
Gowron increases the ship's Energy Weapon Damage by X.
Gowron increases the ship's Shield Deflection by X of total Crew Health.
While on an Interceptor fighting a player ship, at the start of a round Gul Dukat has X chance to apply Hull Breach to it for 3 rounds.
When shot while on an Interceptor fighting a player ship with Hull Breach, Gul Dukat increases the number of shots by X once per Weapon for 5 rounds.
Hadley increases the Warp Speed of the ship by X.
Hadley increases Ship Experience gained on Survey ships by X.
When fighting Explorers, John Harrison increases the Weapon damage of the ship by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
For the first round of combat, John Harrison ignores X of the opponent's shield. Works against Hostiles and Players of level 70 and under.
Harry Kim increases all positive Reputation gains by X.
At the start of a round, Harry Kim has a X chance to apply Morale to your ship for 1 round when fighting non-Player hostiles or Armadas.
Harcourt Fenton Mudd has a X chance to raise shield mitigation to 98% for the first two rounds of combat. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Harcourt Fenton Mudd has a X chance to double the shots of all the weapons of the ship for the first round of combat. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Helvia increases the Mining Rate of the ship by X when mining Parsteel.
As long as the Cargo of the ship is empty, Helvia increases its Warp speed by X.
As long as Hull Health is below 60% of its value at the start of combat, Hendorff increases Dodge, Armor and Shield Deflection by X.
Hendorff increases the Ship Experience gained on Explorers by X
When fighting other players, Honorguard Worf increases the ship's Armor Piercing by X of Crew Attack whenever the ship scores a critical hit.
For the first 8 rounds of combat against other players, Honorguard Worf increases the Critical Hit Chance of the ship by X.
Hoshi Sato increases the Cargo size of the ship by X (X at rank X) of base.
Hoshi Sato increases Gas mining speed by X (X at rank X) of base.
Hugh increases the Impulse Speed of your ship by X.

Hugh has X chance to increase Critical Hit Chance by 25% for 2 rounds after being hit by a Hostile. (This ability can stack) (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack)

Against players with Hull Breach, Icheb increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 4 rounds each time you score a hit (Once per weapon)(Cumulative). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.

On round start against players, if on a ship with no State applied Icheb increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds (Cumulative). -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
Ikat'ika increases all Mitigation stats by X for 1 Round every Round when when fighting players, if on an Explorer.
Ikat'ika increases Weapon Damage by X at the start of each Round for 3 Rounds when fighting players, if on an Explorer with Morale.

Against players with Hull Breach, Infiltrator Tuvok increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds each time you score a hit (Once per weapon)(Cumulative). -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.

On round start against players, if on a ship with no State applied Infiltrator Tuvok increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds (Cumulative). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.

If the ship is a Battleship, Javaid increases its Armor by X.
Jaylah increases the amount of resources you get from killing hostiles and Outposts by X while on the Franklin and Franklin-A.
When Jaylah is on the Franklin and fighting Swarm hostiles, Jaylah increases the number of shots of the Franklin and Franklin-A by X.

Jean-Luc Picard increases the effectiveness of all Officer Abilities that trigger in combat by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under. -- This ability receives the same synergy bonus from all TNG Officers, regardless of class.
Jean-Luc Picard increases your Critical Hit Damage by X.
When attacking a Station, Joachim has X chances of greatly increasing the mitigation of the ship for the first round of combat.
When attacking a Station, Joachim decreases the Weapon Damage of all opponent's Ships and Defense Platforms by X
Joaquin increases the Protected Cargo of the ship by X
Joaquin increases the Mining Rate of the ship by  X when mining Corrupted Data and Decoded Data.
Increases the amount of resources you get from destroying Xindi hostiles by X.

When you take damage from a hostile or another player, Jonathan Archer increases your Critical Hit damage by X (X at rank X) for 2 rounds. (This ability can stack) (Does not trigger at Armadas or Assaults) (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack)

At the start of each round, if the target of the ship is a Defense Platform, Kati increases the Chances of a Critical Hit by X for that round.
When attacking a Station, Kati increases the Critical Hit Damage by X.

On round start against players with Assimilate, Mirror Ezri increases your Kinetic Weapon damage by X (X at rank X) for 1 round.

On round start against players, Mirror Kira increases your Apex Barrier by  X each round for 5 rounds (cumulative). -- Mirror Kira receives full synergy bonuses from all Mirror officers regardless of class. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
On round start against players with Assimilate, Mirror Kira increases your shots by X (X at rank X) each round for 5 rounds (cumulative).

On round start against players, Mirror Picard increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 2 rounds. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.

On round start against players with Assimilate, Mirror Picard increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 1 round. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.

On combat start while against an Explorer player: Mirror Troi increases your Apex Barrier by X for the duration of combat. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
On round start against players with Assimilate, Mirror Troi increases your Energy Weapon damage by X (X at rank X) for 1 round.

Increases your existing Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 2 rounds after receiving HHP damage from a player ship with Assimilate (Once per weapon). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship or during station combat.
Increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) at the start of combat versus non-Armada Hostiles. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
On round start against players afflicted by Burning, Miss Q increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds.

On round start, if placed on a ship with Morale against players, Miss Q increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 1 round. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Mitchell increases the Stats of all Officers on Board by X when defending the Station.
When getting hit by a Critical Hit, Mitchell increases the ship Weapon Damage by X for one round.
After winning a battle, Moreau heals the Shield Health by X.
Moreau decreases the Armor Piercing, Shield Piercing and Accuracy of Hostiles by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.

When the ship takes damage from an Armada Target weapon attack, Harry Mudd decreases the Weapon Damage of that Armada Target by X for this round. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this maneuver once per attack.)
When the ship's Shield Health is depleted, Harry Mudd increases the Weapon Damage of the ship by X for the rest of the combat. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Increases the Cost Efficiency of the Borg Cube's Transwarp Jump by X.
Increases the base damage of the Borg Cube's Cutting Beam against players by X (X at rank X).
Increases base repair cost efficiency of the ship X (X at rank X).
At the start of each round, if the ship has a Hull Breach, Navi increases the Critical Hit damage bonus by X for this round.
At the start of each round, if the ship has a Hull Breach, Navi increases the Armor, Shield Deflection and Dodge of the ship by X for this round.
Increases the Cost Efficiency of your ship's active abilities by X when assigned to the U.S.S. Voyager.
X chance each round to apply Burning for 1 round versus non-Player hostiles or Armadas. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship
At the beginning of each round, if the opponent's ship is Burning, Nero increases the Damage of the weapons by X.
Every time the ship strikes the opponent with a weapon attack, Nero has a X chance of Burning it for two rounds.
Jason Nesmith decreases Invading Entities Shield Mitigation by  X
Jason Nesmith increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) when fighting hostiles. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Next Gen Crusher increases the Health of all Officers on the ship by X.
During combat, Next Gen Crusher increases the effectiveness of the Captain Maneuver by X.
Next Gen Data increases the Attack, Defense and Health of all Officers on the Bridge by X.
Next Gen Data increases the Weapon damage of the ship by X.
Next Gen La Forge decreases the Weapon Damage of the opponent's ship by X.
Next Gen La Forge increases the Shield Health of the ship by X.
Next Gen Riker increases the damage of the first shots of the ship by X for the first round.
Next Gen Riker increases the Attack of all the Officers on the ship by X.
Next Gen Troi increases the Weapon Damage of the ship by X.
Next Gen Troi increases the Shield Deflection, Armor and Dodge of the ship by X.
When fighting a Borg ship, Nine of Eleven decreases the Chance of dealing a critical hit of the opponent by X.
Nine of Eleven increases the Defense of every Officer on the ship by X.
Nog increases Apex Barrier by X for 2 rounds on round start, when attacking a Station. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Nog reduces Critical Hit Chance by X (X at rank X) for 2 rounds on round start against players, if the opponent has any state.
Odo increases base Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X against Solo Armadas.
Odo increases Critical Hit Damage by X.
The ship mitigates X more damage to the Shield Health instead of the Hull Health.
The Protected Cargo is increased by X
Origins Burnham increases the Attack of all the Officers on the ship by X.
Origins Burnham increases the Weapon Damage of the ship by X.

Origins Saru increases the Hull Health of the ship by X.
Origins Stamets increases the Health of all the Officers on the ship by X.
Origins Stamets increases the Warp Speed of the ship by X.
At the start of each round, if the target of the ship is a Defense Platform, Otto increases the damage of the ship by X for that round.
Otto increases the Attack of each officer on the Bridge of the ship by X.
Pan increases the Impulse Speed of the ship by X.
At the start of each round, Pan has a X chance of applying a Hull Breach to his own ship for 3 rounds.
Stamets increases the Cost Efficiency of Jumping and Summoning with the Discovery by X.
When defending against a Player, Stamets decreases the opponent's Armor Piercing by X.
Increases base positive Reputation gained from Federation, Klingon and Romulan Hostiles by X (X at rank X)
Increases base protected cargo by X (X at rank X)
On combat start against players and hostiles, Phlox reduces the opponent's Critical Hit Chance by X (X at rank X), for 8 rounds. (Does not trigger at Armadas, Assaults or Station Combat).
Phlox increases the efficiency of charging the Borg Cube's Cutting Beam by X (X at rank X)
At the start of a round, Admiral Picard has a X chance to apply Morale for 3 rounds against player ships.
Admiral Picard increases your ship base Weapon Damage by X on combat start against a player Explorer for the duration of combat.

Increases Critical Hit Damage by X every time your ship is hit by an attack while fighting Non-Armada Hostiles. (Cumulative) (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
Beverly increases the amount of Broken Parts you get from killing hostiles by X.
Increase the amount of raw Ore, Crystal and Gas collected while mining with any ship by an extra X (X at rank X), without draining the mining node faster.
At the beginning of each round of combat Hugh repairs X (X at rank X) of hull damage taken in the previous round of combat.
At the start of a round, Riker has X chance to apply Burning for 3 rounds against player ships.
Riker increases your ship base Weapon Damage by X on combat start against a player Battleship for the duration of combat.
At the start of a round, Worf has X chance to apply Hull Breach for 3 rounds against player ships.
Worf increases your ship base Weapon Damage by X on combat start against a player Interceptor for the duration of combat.
Christopher Pike increases the effectiveness of all Officer Abilities that trigger in combat by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Christopher Pike increases the Ship XP earned by combat by X. Works against Hostiles of level 70 and under.
Pon has a X chance at the start of combat to delay opponent weapons for 3 Rounds when attacked by players, if your ship is an Explorer.
Pon decreases opponent player's Critical Chance by X at the start of each Round for 3 Rounds if on an Explorer with Morale.
When the ship gets a Hull Breach from the opponent, Qa'ug decreases all the stats of the officers on the opponent's ship by X.
When the ship gets a Hull Breach from the opponent, Qa'ug increases Accuracy by X.
Increase protected cargo by X.
Increase mining speed by X.
Increases Apex Shred against players by X (X at rank X). -- Apex Barrier remaining after Apex Shred is equal to: -- Apex Barrier / (100% + Apex Shred) -- 100% Apex Shred reduces Apex Barrier by 50%.

Increases Apex Shred against non-Armada hostiles by X (X at rank X). -- Apex Barrier remaining after Apex Shred is equal to: -- Apex Barrier / (100% + Apex Shred) -- 100% Apex Shred reduces Apex Barrier by 50%.
Increases base Loot gained from non-Armada hostiles by X (X at rank X).
Increases Apex Barrier against Battleship hostiles by X (X at rank X). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Reginald Barclay increases the base Defense of all Officers by X.
Reginald Barclay increases the ship's base Protected Cargo by X.
At the start of each round, if the ship has a Hull Breach, Rima increases the Damage of the ship by X for this round.
At the start of each round, if the ship has a Hull Breach, Rima adds X to Critical Hit chances
Ro Mudd increases her stats by X when she is the captain.
At the start of combat, Ro Mudd has a X chance of increasing the Damage dealt by the ship by 300% of the total Attack of all officers on the ship for the whole combat.
When attacking a station, Rom delays opponent ship and defense platform Weapon Fire for X round. -- This ability does not gain synergy group benefits.
When attacking a station, Rom increases the number of shots of the ship's weapons by X.
On round start against players afflicted by Burning, Romi increases your Isolytic Defense by X (X at rank X) for 3 rounds.

On round start against players afflicted by Hull Breach, Romi increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 1 round. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
When inside an Explorer, Rukor increases the Weapon Damage against players by X.
If the opponent is a player, Rukor increases the damage made by the Energy Weapons of the ship by X.

Increases Apex Shred  against non-Armada hostiles by X (X at rank X). -- Apex Barrier remaining after Apex Shred is equal to: -- Apex Barrier / (100% + Apex Shred) -- 100% Apex Shred reduces Apex Barrier by 50%.
Increases Apex Shred against players by X (X at rank X). -- Apex Barrier remaining after Apex Shred is equal to: -- Apex Barrier / (100% + Apex Shred) -- 100% Apex Shred reduces Apex Barrier by 50%.
Sam Rutherford increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X.
Sam Rutherford increases the ship's Shield Health by X.
When fighting players, every time your ship is hit by a Critical Hit, Saru decreases the Critical Hit Chance of the opponent's ship by X.
When fighting players, Saru decreases the opponent's weapon damage by X.
Scotty reduces the time needed to repair the ship by X.
Scotty increases the total Hull Health of the ship by X of its original Hull Health.
While cloaked, Sela increases Critical Hit Damage by X.
When fighting other players, Sela decreases the enemy's Critical Hit Chance by X every time the ship scores a hit.
If the opponent is an Eclipse hostile (including Armada Targets), Sesha has a X chance to reduce the opponent's Critical Hit Chance by 15%
For the first three rounds of combat, when fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armada Targets), Sesha increases the Critical Damage Bonus of the ship by X.
Restores the Shield Health of your ship every round by X (X at rank X) when fighting hostiles.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by X (X at rank X) for 4 rounds each time you score a hit (Once per weapon) when fighting hostiles.
When fighting a Borg Tactical Probe, Seven of Eleven has a X chance of increasing the number of shots of each weapon by 2.
Seven of Eleven increases the Health of every Officer on the ship by X.
Increases your ship's Critical Hit Damage by X versus Armadas.
Increases your ship's Isolytic Cascade by X versus players. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
When the ship is Burning from the opponent, Severus decreases the opponent's Hull Health by X each round.
When the ship is Burning from the opponent, Severus increases the Damage of the ship by X.

On round start, if on a Battleship and enemy player has Burning, Shaxs increases your Isolytic Cascade damage by X for 1 round. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
On round start, if on an Explorer with Morale, Shaxs increases your Isolytic Defense by X for 1 round against players.
Shev increases the Tritanium rewards for defeating a Hostile by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Shev increases the damage of the Energy weapons of the ship by X.
Shran increases base Warp Speed by X (X at rank X).
Shran increases Crystal mining speed by X (X at rank X) of base.

Every time the ship hits an opponent with a weapon attack, Six of Eleven decreases the opponent's Shield Health by X of the total Defense of all officers on the ship. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this maneuver once per attack.)

When attacking an Armada Target, every time the ship hits the opponent with a weapon attack, Six of Eleven increases the Accuracy, Armor Piercing and Shield Piercing of the ship by X of the total Attack of all officers on the ship. -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
SNW D'Chok increases Common, Uncommon, Rare, and Epic Transogen Mining Speed by X (X at rank X).
SNW D'Chok increases the ship's Weapon Damage by X (X at rank X).
SNW Hemmer increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of total Health when in combat with hostile Survey ships.
SNW Hemmer increases the Health of all Officers on the ship by X of their base value.

SNW M'Benga increases all mitigation stats by  X of Officer Health vs non-Armada Hostiles
SNW M'Benga increases SHP every round by X (X at rank X) vs non-Armada Hostiles
Increases the amount of Volatile Isomatter you get from destroying Gorn Hunters by X (X at rank X)

At the start of combat, SNW Chapel increases Isolytic Cascade damage by X (X at rank X) vs non-Armada Hostiles. -- Isolytic Cascade multiplies your total damage, including Isolytic Damage, and all research and other bonuses.
When fighting hostiles, SNW Ortegas increases critical hit chance against hostiles by X.
SNW Ortegas increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of total Health when attacking hostile Explorers from a Battleship.
SNW Pelia reduces Isolytic Damage received from non-Armada hostiles by X (X at rank X)
SNW Pelia increases Isolytic Defense by X (X at rank X)
When fighting hostiles, SNW Pike increases Shield Mitigation by X.

SNW Sam Kirk reduces enemy SHP by X every round vs non-Armada Hostiles
SNW Sam Kirk increases Critical Damage by X (X at rank X) vs non-Armada Hostiles

When fighting hostiles, SNW Spock decreases hostile critical hit chance by X.
SNW Spock increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of total Defense when attacking hostile Interceptors from an Explorer.
SNW T'Pring increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X (X at rank X) of total Defense against non-Armada hostiles.
SNW T'Pring Increases the amount of 3⇵-6⇵ Ore/Crystal/Gas collected by X (X at rank X), without draining the mining node faster.
When fighting hostiles, SNW Uhura increases critical hit damage against hostiles by X.
SNW Uhura increases Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of total Attack when attacking hostile Battleships from an Interceptor.
When fighting hostiles, SNW Una increases base Weapon Damage by X.
SNW Una increases Impulse Speed by X.
On round start against players, Soran has X chance to apply Burning to your target for 1 round. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.

On round start against players commanding an Explorer afflicted by Burning, Soran increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 5 rounds. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
On round start against player Battleships with Hull Breach, Specialist Seven increases your shots by X each round for 4 rounds (Cumulative)
On round start against players, Specialist Seven has X (X at rank X) chance to apply Hull Breach to your target for 2 rounds.
Spock increases the Accuracy of the ship by X at the beginning of each Round in combat.
While the ship has Morale, Spock restores Shield Health to an amount equal to X of the Defense of the Officers on the ship.
On round start against players, Starfleet Q has X chance to apply Morale to your ship for 1 round.

On round start, if placed on a ship with Morale against players commanding an Interceptor, Starfleet Q increases your Apex Barrier by X (X at rank X) for 5 rounds. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
Stonn increases the Mining Rate of the ship by X when mining Ore.
Stonn increases the Cargo size of the ship by X.
While on a Battleship fighting a Burning player ship, at the start of each round Strike Team SNW La'an increases the number of shots per Weapon by X.
While on a Battleship fighting a player ship, each time your ship hits with a weapon, Strike Team SNW La'an has a X chance of Burning it for 3 rounds.
When shot by a player Explorer, Strike Team SNW Ortegas has X chance of Burning them for 3 rounds.
While on a Battleship fighting a player ship, Strike Team SNW Ortegas causes weapons shot by them to have a X chance of having their next attack delayed by 1 round.
While in combat against a player Explorer, Strike Team SNW Una increases all Officer stats by X each round.
While on a Battleship fighting a player ship, Strike Team SNW Una decreases their Shield Mitigation by X each round.
Repairs X (X at rank X) of hull damage taken in the previous round of combat when fighting hostiles.
At the start of combat increases Critical Hit Damage by X (X at rank X) for 5 rounds when fighting hostiles.
When the ship is getting hit by a Critical Hit, Sulu has a X chance of inspiring Morale to the ship for one round.
When the ship has Morale, Sulu increases the total damage made by Energy Weapons by X.
T'Laan increases the Ship Experience gained by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, T'Laan decreases the Damage done by its Kinetic Weapons by X. Works against Hostiles of level 51 and under.
T'Pol increases Protected Cargo by X of base.
T'Pol increases Ore mining speed by X of base.
T'pring increases the Mining Rate of the ship by X when mining Gas.
T'Pring increases the Protected Cargo by X.
When fighting Battleships, Tal increases the Weapon damage of the ship by X
Tal decreases the opponent ship's Hull Health by a cumulative X each round while it is Burning versus players, and Hostiles level 60 and under.
Tasha Yar reduces the Crit Chance of Mission Hostiles (yellow hostiles) by X.
Tasha Yar increases all Weapon Damage against non-player targets by X.
Ten of Eleven increases the speed of Parsteel, Tritanium and Dilithium Mining by X.
Ten of Eleven increases the Mining Speed of the ship by X.

When you take hull damage from a non-Player hostile or Armada, The Doctor increases your Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of Health for 2 rounds. (cumulative). -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
Increases all resources dropped by hostiles and Outposts by X.
The Hierarch increases Shots by X (200% at max synergy) for 2 rounds on round start against players.
The Hierarch has a X (X at rank X) chance of applying Hull Breach, Burning, or Assimilate for 2 rounds on a round start against players.
Three Of Eleven increases Gas mining speed by X.
Three Of Eleven increases Protected Cargo by X.
At the start of combat, when defending from a player attack, Tilly decreases the opponent's Shield Health by X of its starting Shield Health.
Every time the ship is hit by an opponent's weapon attack, Tilly has a X chance to decrease the opponent's officers Attack by 15% (cumulative) -- Decreasing Attack may result in a decrease in Damage
When fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armada Targets), for the first three rounds of combat, Tiza decreases the Shield Mitigation of the opponent by X
When fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armadas), Tiza has a X chance to increase Shield Deflection, Armor and Dodge by 100% for the whole combat.

TMP Hikaru Sulu increases Apex Barrier by X for 10 rounds against non-Armada Hostiles, Outposts and Retaliation Hostiles. Works against Hostiles of level 81 and under. -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
On round start, TMP Hikaru Sulu increases your ship's critical chance by X (X at rank X) for 4 rounds, if any state is applied to non-Armada Hostiles, Outposts or Retaliation Hostiles.

TMP Nyota Uhura increases your ship's Isolytic Cascade Damage by X (X at rank X) when fighting non-Armada Hostiles, Outposts, or Retaliation Hostiles.
Decreases all Armada and Invading Entities base Mitigation stats by X(X at rank X) of Officer Defense every round (Cumulative)
Increases base Warp Speed by X (X at rank X)

When you take damage from a non-Player hostile or Armada, Tom Paris increases your Critical Hit damage by X for 1 round. (cumulative). -- (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack.)
At the start of combat against non-Player hostiles or Armadas, Tom Paris increases your Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X of Defense.
While cloaked, Tomalak increases Armor Piercing, Shield Penetration, and Accuracy by X.
Tomalak increases Weapon Damage against Klingon targets by X of total Crew Attack.
TOS Chekov increases the Impulse Speed of Explorers by X.
When attacked while on a Capture or Mining Node by a player, TOS Chekov decreases the opponent's damage by X.

When fighting players, at the start of each turn, as long as the ship has Morale, TOS James T. Kirk increases the damage of energy weapons by X of the total Defense of all Officers on the ship (cumulative).
At the start of each round, if the ship's Health is above 30% of its starting value, TOS James T. Kirk has a X chance to inspire Morale to the ship for this round.
When defending, TOS Leonard McCoy increases the Shield Deflection, Armor, and Dodge of the ship by X of the Health of all Officers on the ship.
If the ship is an Explorer, TOS Leonard McCoy increases the Attack, Defense, and Health of all Officers on the ship by X.
TOS Scotty increases the Warp Range of Explorers by X.
TOS Scotty increases the Repair Cost Efficiency of the ship by X. -- This ability is applied after all other bonuses from research and/or your station and stacked on top.

When defending, at the start of each turn, TOS Spock restores Shield Health to an amount equal to X of the Defense of the Officers on the ship (restores the Shield Health of all your ships if the ship is defending the station).
When fighting players, as long as the ship has Morale, TOS Spock decreases the Critical Hit Damage bonus of the opponent's ship by X.
At the start of each round, TOS Hikaru Sulu has a X chance of inspiring Morale for one round.
If the ship is an Explorer, at the start of each turn, if the ship has Morale, TOS Hikaru Sulu increases its Critical Hit Chance by X for that round.
When fighting players, as long as the ship has Morale, TOS Nyota Uhura decreases the opponent's Critical Hit Chance by X.

When fighting players, as long as the ship has Morale, TOS Nyota Uhura removes X from the Shield Mitigation of the opponent's ship. -- Shield Mitigation determines the amount of damage dealt to the shield health

When you take damage from a hostile or another player, Trip Tucker decreases your opponent's critical damage by X for 2 rounds. (This ability can stack) (Does not trigger at Armadas or Assaults) (Weapons with multiple shots will only trigger this ability once per attack)
Increases the amount of resources you get from destroying Hirogen and Species 8472 hostiles by X.
Increases the amount of Artifact Tokens gained from Formation Armadas by X.
Increases your ship's Cargo Capacity by X of base if your ship is the U.S.S. Voyager.
Two of Eleven increases the Cargo size of the ship by X.
Two of Eleven increases the rate of Crystal, Gas, and Ore Mining by X.
When defending on a Capture Node, Ash Tyler gives all Officers on the ship a bonus of X to their Attack. -- Increasing Attack may result in an increase in Damage
At the start of each round, if the opponent is Burning, Ash Tyler increases the damage of the ship by X of the total Attack of all officers on the ship (cumulative).
When the shield is depleted, Uhura has a X chance of delaying the next opponent weapon fire by one Round.
Uhura increases the Accuracy of the ship she's in by X.
When inside an Interceptor, Vartoq increases the Weapon Damage against players by X.
If the opponent is a player, Vartoq increases the damage made by the Kinetic Weapons of the ship by X.
Vel increases the Dilithium rewards for defeating a Hostile by X.
If the opponent is a Hostile, Vel increases the damage made by the Kinetic Weapons of the ship by X.
If the opponent's ship is an Explorer, Vella increases the damage of weapons by X.
Vella increases the total Health of all Officers on the ship by X.

If the ship survives an attack that depletes its shields and is destroyed in one of the following attacks during the same battle, the battle is lost but Vemet heals X of the Hull Health and the ship survives. This takes precedence over the NSEA Protector’s Omega-13 Ship Ability and does not stack.
At the beginning of each round, if the opponent's ship is Burning, Vemet decreases its Shield Health by an amount equal to X of the Health of all Officers on the ship.
VIL Gul Dukat increases Shots by X (X at rank X) when attacking a Station.
VIL Gul Dukat reduces enemy player Critical Chance by X (X at rank X) during 4 rounds at the start of the combat.
When attacking a station, Winn Adami ignores X (X at rank X) of the opponent's shield for the first 3 rounds.
Reduces enemy player Critical Damage by X (X at rank X) .
At the beginning of each round, Vixis has a X chance of delaying the opponent Weapon Fire by one round.
Vixis decreases the Energy Weapon Damage of opponent players by X.
Wesley Crusher increases Weapon Damage against Hostiles and Armadas by X of Crew Attack.

On round start, Weyoun has a X chance to apply Morale for 3 rounds when fighting against players, if on an Explorer.

On combat start, WOK Leonard McCoy increases your Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X (X at rank X) of Health when in Wave Defense.
On combat start against non-player hostiles or Armadas, WOK Leonard McCoy increases your Armor, Shield Deflection, and Dodge by X (X at rank X) of Defense.

If the opponent's ship is a Battleship, Woteln increases the Damage of the weapons by X.

Increases Apex Barrier against Interceptor hostiles by X (X at rank X). -- This ability does not trigger when Tal is assigned to the bridge of your ship.
